review:
As per Prato I booked the slot at 10am and before  did that, I tried to reach them on phone, nobody had attended the call. Booked the slot at 10am.I reached there around 9:30 and the receptionist said the doctor would come only by 10:30 am, she mentioned that‚Äôs the time they gave to Practo. I had to wait for around 1.5 hours. The doctor came around 11am. The doctor didn‚Äôt even check with a stethoscope, he prescribed the medicines *** *** *** **** ** ****** ** ********** ***** *** ******** While he was attending a bunch of people came and sat in front of him, it should be first come first serve.
It wasn‚Äôt a good experience and not recommending to anyone.
